query.sql: SELECT t.pk_id as "pkId", t.right_code AS "rightCode", t.p_code AS "pCode", t.right_name AS "rightName", t.right_url AS "rightUrl", t.right_type as "rightType", t.order_code as "orderCode" FROM sys_right t where t.right_type='0' order by t.order_code asc
SELECT t.pk_id AS "rightId", t.right_code AS "rightCode", t.right_name AS "rightName", t.order_code AS "orderCode" FROM sys_right t WHERE t.p_code = :pCode ORDER BY t.order_code ASC

SELECT DISTINCT t.pk_id as "pkId", t.right_code AS "rightCode", t.p_code AS "pCode", t.right_name AS "rightName", t.right_url AS "rightUrl", t.right_type as "rightType", t.order_code as "orderCode" FROM sys_right t left join sys_role_right rr on rr.right_code=t.right_code and rr.role_code in (:roleCodes) where rr.role_code in (:roleCodes) and t.right_type='0' order by t.order_code asc

SELECT t.pk_id as "pkId", t.right_code AS "rightCode", t.p_code AS "pCode", t.right_name AS "rightName", t.right_url AS "rightUrl", t.right_type as "rightType", t.order_code as "orderCode", r.role_code as "roleCode" FROM sys_right t left join sys_role_right rr on rr.right_code=t.right_code and rr.role_code=:roleCode left join sys_role r on r.role_code=rr.role_code where 1=1 order by t.order_code asc
SELECT * from sys_right t where t.p_code = :rightCode

SELECT DISTINCT t.right_code AS "rightCode", t.right_name AS "rightName" FROM sys_right t left join sys_role_right rr on rr.right_code=t.right_code and rr.role_code in (:roleCodes) where rr.role_code in (:roleCodes) and t.right_type='1' order by rightCode asc
